meanings.definition: A device that removes ions from a solution.
meanings.sent1: The deioniser helped clean the water by taking out the ions.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a deioniser to purify the solution.
meanings.sent3: The deioniser and the ions had a race to see who could finish first.
meanings.sent4: The deioniser acted like a magnet, pulling the ions away from the solution.
meanings.sent5: The deioniser hummed softly as it worked its magic on the solution.

meanings.definition: To remove ions from a solution using a deioniser.
meanings.sent1: I will deionise the solution with the deioniser.
meanings.sent2: She deionises the water every morning before using it.
meanings.sent3: The deioniser decided to take a day off and let the ions stay in the solution.
meanings.sent4: He deionised the solution so quickly, it was like watching a magician perform a trick.
meanings.sent5: The deioniser deionised the solution with such precision, it was like watching a master at work.
